docs.title: Credit System - Flutter Frontend
docs.text: Welcome to the automated documentation for the Credit System Flutter frontend.

docs.title: 🚀 Quick Start
docs.text:
This documentation is automatically generated from your Flutter codebase using:

  • AI-powered documentation using Cursor-style patterns
  • Automatic codebase discovery and indexing
  • Dynamic content generation from actual code structure
  • Live updates with code changes

docs.title: 📊 Codebase Overview
docs.text:
• 📁 Files: 35
  • 🏗️ Classes: 26
  • 🎨 Widgets: 20
  • ⚙️ Managers: 14

docs.title: 🔍 Features
docs.text:
• 🔍 Auto-generated API Reference: All classes and widgets are documented
  • 🔄 Live Updates: Documentation updates automatically with code changes
  • 🔎 Search: Full-text search across all documentation
  • 🌙 Dark Mode: Toggle between light and dark themes
  • 📱 Mobile-Friendly: Responsive design for all devices

docs.title: 📚 Navigation
docs.text:
• 📖 API Reference: Detailed documentation of all code components
  • 🏗️ Architecture: System design and state management documentation
  • 🛠️ Development: Setup, testing, and deployment guides

docs.title: Architecture Layers
docs.text:
1. UI Layer - Flutter widgets and screens
  2. State Layer - State management and data flow
  3. Service Layer - External service interactions
  4. Manager Layer - Core application managers
  5. Utils Layer - Common utilities and tools

docs.title: State Management
docs.text: How state is managed in the Flutter application.

docs.title: State Management Pattern
docs.text:
The application uses a combination of:

  • Provider - For state management
  • StateManager - For centralized state management
  • ModuleManager - For module state management
  • ServicesManager - For service state management

docs.title: State Flow
docs.text:
1. UI Event → Widget
  2. State Update → StateManager
  3. Module Update → ModuleManager
  4. Service Call → ServicesManager
  5. UI Update → Widget

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: Deployment procedures and guidelines.

docs.title: Build for Production
docs.text:
flutter build apk --release
flutter build ios --release

docs.title: Development Setup
docs.text: How to set up the Flutter development environment.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Flutter SDK 3.0+
  • Dart SDK 3.0+
  • Android Studio / VS Code
  • Git

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
flutter pub get
flutter run

docs.title: Testing
docs.text: Testing guidelines and procedures.

docs.title: Running Tests
docs.text: flutter test
